long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Page Info Viewer: Instant Insight into Page Metadata

Quickly access hidden page information with a single click. Perfect for developers, QA engineers, and tech professionals who need to rapidly inspect page details without looking into page-source.

üîç Key Features:
- One-click access to page metadata
- Clean, modern interface
- Emoji-tagged information categories
- Copy-to-clipboard functionality
- Supports custom page information tags

üöÄ Ideal For:
- Web Developers & Product Managers
- Quality Assurance Engineers
- Site Reliability Professionals

üí° How It Works:
Simply click the extension icon to reveal:
- Region details
- Page type
- Release information
- Version numbers
- UI framework
- Timestamp and more

üîí Privacy First:
- Reads only visible page metadata
- No tracking or data collection
- Works locally in your browser

Whether you're debugging, verifying deployments, or quickly checking site details, Page Info Viewer gives you instant insights without the hassle of digging through page source.

Quick, Clean, Efficient: Your Go-To Tool for Rapid Page Metadata Inspection!
